skillTree.name: Tunnel Boss
skillTree.description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bellower
skillTree.description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.

skillTree.name: Dodgy Geezer
skillTree.description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.name: Goblintide
skillTree.description:
Ten Goblins? Inconvenient.
	A hundred? Alarming.
	A thousand? 
	Uh oh!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +6 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grom's Chariot
skillTree.description: Grom's chariot is solidly built and equally capable of carrying his bulk and trampling his enemies.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "Da Ladz Have a Kunnin Plan!" for Goblin Wolf Rider, Spider Raider, Squig Rider, and Goblin Chariot units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: His Great Immensity
skillTree.description: Grom is titanic – a bloated Goblin of such great immensity that every other gobbo looks up to him, both figuratively and literally!

skillTree.name: Culinary Curmudgeon
skillTree.description: Every settlement keeps the fires stoked and the meat burning in case Grom decides to show up for an impromptu snack.

skillTree.name: Gargantuan Glutton
skillTree.description: Grom's ridiculous girth provides some measure of protection against the weapons of his puny foes.

skillTree.name: Chariot Races
skillTree.description: "Paint it red! More spikes! Bigga wheelz! STIKK SOME BOMBZ ON THE BACK!"

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Chariot and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Boisterous Shakedown
skillTree.description: Grom's appetite cannot be contained merely to the culinary realm…

skillTree.name: Roll 'Em Over!
skillTree.description:
"We're gonna dis-kum-bob-url-rate em good!"
	"Izzat even a word?"
	"Dunno."

effects.description: Attacks cause "Rattled" effect, reducing combat ability

skillTree.name: Down to Size
skillTree.description: Those of great stature often overlook the humble Goblin. Goblins, however, are almost preternaturally aware of nearby shins in need of a good stabbin'!

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large: +10 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Comin' Back!
skillTree.description: Like any good Warboss, Grom understands well the art of getting back up after every setback.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -7 for Elven units
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Choppas
skillTree.description: Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Da Gobbos
skillTree.description: Orcs may be stronger, but Goblins are smarter, nastier, and better-er.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +7% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Riderz
skillTree.description: Greenskin cavalry can be devastating if the myriad mounts can behave. Getting a big stick and maybe a "carrot" in the form of an orange-painted gobbo is the answer!

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for melee cavalry, Orc Boar Chariot, and Squig Herd units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Da Boyz
skillTree.description: This Boss is one with "da boyz", egging the lads on to greater feats and to hit bigga stuff with their choppas.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Orc infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Base missile damage: +3% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Orc infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +7% for Orc infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Base missile damage: +5% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Orc infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Orc infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Base missile damage: +7% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Orc Arrer Boyz and Savage Orc Arrer Boyz units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: ‘Ard as Nailz
skillTree.description: Ridin’ on chariots means ya can be even more fighty, an' even more killy!

effects.description:
Armour: +4 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +3% for missile cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +4% for Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +5% for missile cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for missile cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Chariots and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for missile cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +7% for missile cavalry and chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Da Big Ladz
skillTree.description: Even bigga than a Black Orc, an' not bad at killin’ too!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Deff From Abuv
skillTree.description: This Boss realises the power of "flyin’ fings” and so invests a few teef in making sure his war machines can fling fings really far and really high!

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +5% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +7% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stabberz
skillTree.description: The sneakiest and stabbiest gobboes are just as dangerous as the largest, fiercest Orcs.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for all Goblin, Pump Wagon, Night Goblin and Squig Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: 'Ard Ladz
skillTree.description: ‘Ardest of da ‘Ard. Don’t mess, gottit?

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Orc units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Biggest ‘n' Strongest
skillTree.description: It’s one fing to be big, but quite anuva to be strong as well!

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Trolls, Giant, Rogue Idol and Arachnarok Spider units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Savage Smartz
skillTree.description: Nuffin' smashes harder than a rock fallin' from da sky, except mebbe da Bad Moon, if it were to fall.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +20% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Deff From Below
skillTree.description: A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.

effects.description: Evasion chance when using the Underway: +6%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +16%
Evasion chance when using the Underway: +30%

skillTree.name: Raider
skillTree.description: Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Looter
skillTree.description: Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +4%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +8%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +12%

skillTree.name: Ravager
skillTree.description: Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Iron-Hard
skillTree.description: These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Out-Clevering
skillTree.description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.

skillTree.name: Mob Boss
skillTree.description: A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.

skillTree.name: Really Green
skillTree.description: Being green meanz ya really mean.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Da Great 'Un
backgroundSkills.description: Maintaining a chariot that can support Grom's immense weight pushes Goblin engineering skills to their limits.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 when fighting against Elves
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Goblin units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -35% for Chariot and Pump Wagon units
	(Lord's army)
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

items.name: Lucky Banner
items.description: Along with his serendipitous standard-bearer, Niblet, who once somehow survived being sat on by him, the Goblin King’s banner brings inexplicable luck.

items.name: Axe of Grom
items.description: Like a butcher’s cleaver, Grom uses the fabled ‘Elf-Biter’ to make tasty cuts of meat out of his rivals!
